alert.note: Alert for Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:10AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL GADSDEN...CENTRAL LIBERTY AND LEON COUNTIES... At 810 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Quincy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Juniper, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Walker Ford Community Center, Miccosukee, South City and Eight Mile Pond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
